column4: Good evening, I'm new to Linux and having some issues with screen res on Ubuntu, is anyone able to assist?
Its nvidia 5200. The drivers have been installed, but its restricted to 640x480 res
When I run ï»¿dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg it goes thru a whole section about my keyboard and thats all.. Nothing about resolution.
try adding more resolutions to xorg.conf under Modes
